Text:
Neat. Until seeing the collection pictures in this torrent, I hadn't realized that each album has a sequential number on the spine. Using them to order the albums is better than the year, as many years have more than one album. And as I strive to get all 60, they will be useful in seeing where the gaps are.

I look forward to more! And I will put all of them in their own folder. A right click and play will then play all 60 in sequence.
